import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import FooterComponent from "../components/footer"; import AdminSidebar from "../components/adminSide"; import Header from "../components/header"; import SignIn from "./Signin"; import Redirect from "../components/Redirect"; export default function AddEstab(props) { const [isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); const updateLoginStatus = () => { if(sessionStorage.getItem('user') === 'admin' && sessionStorage.getItem('password') === 'admin123'){ setIsLoggedIn(true); } } useEffect(() => { updateLoginStatus(); },); return ( <> { // (!props.loginStatus) ? ( // // ) : (
